post.summary: Retrieve Studies specified in CSV from external C-MOVE SCP

204.description: Empty file or Incorrect field position or Not a CSV file or Invalid UIDs or Duplicate Retrieves suppressed.

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed or CSV field for Study Instance UID specified as less than 1

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

503.description: Maximal number of Tasks in Queue reached
